titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives on support for Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives on support for Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Eurasia, and Emerging Threats.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
Supports the sovereignty, independence, territorial integrity, and inviolability of Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania, and expresses concerns over increasingly aggressive military maneuvering by the Russian Federation near their borders and airspace.
Encourages the Administration to further enhance defense cooperation efforts with Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania.
